activities: ADVENT INVESTIGATIONS LLC dba VERITAS BACKGROUND SCREENING (ADVENT) provides pre-employment background checks for US clients that maintain offices throughout the European Union and Switzerland.  The pre-employment background checks are on residents of those countries.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Names, address history, dates of birth, national identification numbers, driver’s license numbers, passport numbers, professional licensing or certification information, employment history information, education information, character and professional reference information, as well as criminal and civil litigation history information.  Information needed to demonstrate their fitness for employment
recoursemech: If a dispute cannot be resolved by myself then we will need to defer to EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and/or the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
